Remove any drift toward other assets (e.g., DXY, equity indices) and keep the focus strictly on the 30‑year fixed‑rate.  Add inline citations for every driver: Fed policy (LF0UUL917, 7XH2DKEKV), inflation expectations (LF0UUL917, 7XH2DKEKV), debt‑driven Treasury supply (LF0UUL917), loan‑demand dynamics (LF0UUL917), and balance‑sheet contraction (LF0UUL917).
